summary: Educational institute website with demo class booking form and student reviews showcasing UPSC, MPSC, NEET, and JEE students
architectural_notes: Demo class bookings stored in backend without email notifications (email requires paid plan)

existing_features.title: Create a new admin dashboard page accessible via a route (e.g., /admin) that displays all submitted demo class booking requests in a table format showing name, class, course, and submission timestamp
Connect the admin dashboard to the backend using React Query to fetch and display real-time booking data
Add a navigation link or button in the Header component to access the admin dashboard

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 'Book a Demo Class' button with form (name, class, course) that stores submissions viewable in backend
Update student reviews to feature UPSC, MPSC, NEET, and JEE students
Add a backend query method to retrieve all stored demo class booking submissions

projectName: Add admin dashboard to view demo class bookings
